scripts.thegraph:deploy:mainnet: yarn build:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ salazarguille/yearn-vaults-v2-subgraph-mainnet
scripts.thegraph:deploy:fantom: yarn build:fantom && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ yearn/yearn-vaults-v2-fantom
scripts.thegraph:deploy:arbitrum: yarn build:arbitrum && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ yearn/yearn-vaults-v2-arbitrum
scripts.deploy-local: yarn build:mainnet && graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 yearn-vaults-v2/subgraph
scripts.deploy:fantom: yarn prepare:fantom && yarn build:fantom && yarn thegraph:deploy:fantom
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: yarn prepare:arbitrum && yarn build:arbitrum && yarn thegraph:deploy:arbitrum
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn build:mainnet && yarn thegraph:deploy:mainnet
